title: Qatar sovereign wealth fund buys stake in NBA, NHL, WNBA: Reports
description: Fund is buying a roughly 5 percent stake in Washington teams as part of a $4bn deal, news report says.

title: Why is Indian Prime Minister Modi’s Egypt visit significant?
description: The trip is anticipated to pave the way for a substantial increase in India’s investment in the North African country.

title: Wagner mutiny reflects fault lines in Russia: Analysts

title: The Hajj is where spirituality, solidarity, and science intersect
description: Today, the Hajj is a safe spiritual journey because Muslims have learned and applied public health best practices.

description: While the leadership in Kyiv is weighing how best to seize the moment, average Ukrainians are far less optimistic.

description: Amirabdollahian said he discussed a UN-proposed regional dialogue forum, in addition to trade and investment prospects.

title: Minnesota abortion clinics embrace support in year since Roe fell
description: Abortion providers report increase in patients, public support as US state boosts protections after fall of Roe v Wade.

description: Wagner chief Yevgeny Prigozhin has angered Putin supporters as he stages mutiny against military command.

title: MIT chancellor: What are the challenges facing higher education?

title: Canadian, US safety regulators to probe fatal loss of Titan sub
description: Safety investigation likely to be complicated by poor regulation of deep-sea exploration.

title: Why Wagner mercenary force has moved against Russia’s military
description: Wagner chief Yevgeny Prigozhin claims his fighters are not involved in a military coup but 'a march of justice'.
